professions.profession: Professorin an der Hochschule Mannheim in der Fakultät für Informatik
Professor at the Mannheim University of Applied Sciences at the Faculty of Computer Science

descriptions.description: Prof. Kirstin Kohler ist Expertin in den Fachgebieten rund um User Experience Design/Interaction Design, Design Thinking/Menschzentrierte Innovation und Prototyping. Sie ist Gründungsmitglied des „German Chapters der Usability Professionals Association“. Außerdem leitet sie den Innovation-Hub und Makerspace der Hochschule "inno.space - Design Factory Mannheim".

Prof. Kirstin Kohler is an expert in the fields of user experience design/interaction design, design thinking/human-centered innovation, and prototyping. She is a founding member of the German Chapter of the Usability Professionals Association. She also manages the university's innovation hub and makerspace "inno.space - Design Factory Mannheim".
